entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow changing to snow this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
